name: Jubilant Tribble Component Library
description: A collection of reusable HTML components for the Bootstrap 4.6 CMS environment.

usage_rules.structure: Do not modify the class names or HTML structure of components.
usage_rules.content: Inner text, image src, and link href attributes are placeholders and should be populated.
usage_rules.styles: All components depend on Bootstrap 4.6 and a global custom stylesheet located at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Gara2025/jubilant-tribble/main/036-7-UPLD-GLOBAL-CSS-STYLES-2025-09-29--04-49PM.css

components.name: FAQ Accordion
components.description: A responsive and accessible accordion section for displaying a list of frequently asked questions. Uses semantic <details> and <summary> tags.

components.name: Full Page Layout: Hero + Sticky Nav + Content Blocks
components.description: A complete page template that includes a hero section, a sticky internal navigation bar, and several content blocks for the bottom of the page (FAQs, Why Us, About Us, CTA).

components.name: Dark Product Card
components.description: A card component stress-tested to ensure content (text, links, buttons) remains readable on dark backgrounds.
